articles.author: Annie Siebert
articles.title: No, NFTs aren’t copyrights
articles.description: When artists sell their digitally minted artwork as a non-fungible token, they usually aren’t selling the underlying copyright — but there are overlaps.
articles.content:
For contemporary artists, attaching work to the blockchain in the form of a non-fungible token (NFT) may seem like a secure and verifiable way to sell art online.
In some ways, it is. Blockchain inh… [+5818 chars]
